solution_line_template: If Ariel was born in {birth_year}, she started fencing when she was {fencing_start_year}-{birth_year} = <<{age_at_start}={age_at_start}>>{age_at_start} years old.
Since she's been fencing for {years_fencing} years now, Ariel is {age_at_start}+{years_fencing} = <<{age_at_start}+{years_fencing}={current_age}>>{current_age} years old.
